definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: For most patients, primary treatment is surgery, often with radiation therapy .
sentences.chinese: 大多數病人主要用外科治療，通常伴隨放射療法。

sentences.english: At the moment, such cancers are normally treated through radiation and chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一般通過放射療法和化學療法來治療這些癌症。

sentences.english: Some cancers are treated by radiation therapy.
sentences.chinese: 有些癌症可用放射療法治療。
